American_Young:
{{Infobox musical artist | name = American Young | image = American Young 2014.jpg | image_size = | landscape = | alt = | caption = American Young performing in 2014 | origin = [[Nashville, Tennessee]], U.S. | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | years_active = 2013-present | label = [[Curb Records|Curb]] | website = | current_members = Kristy Osmunson
Jon Stone }} '''American Young''' is an American [[country music]] duo signed to [[Curb Records]]. The duo is composed of Kristy Osmunson, formerly of the group [[Bomshel]], and songwriter/producer Jon Stone. In late 2013, the duo released their debut single, "Love Is War", which has charted on [[Country Airplay]].{{cite web|url=http://music.yahoo.com/blogs/our-country/meet-country-duo-american-young--familiar-faces--new-sound-203059879.html|title=Meet Country Duo American Young: Familiar Faces, New Sound|last=Geller|first=Wendy|date=5 December 2013|work=[[Yahoo! Music]]|accessdate=4 February 2014}} Billy Dukes of [[Taste of Country]] gave the song 4 out of 5 stars, comparing their sound favorably to [[The Civil Wars]].{{cite web|url=http://tasteofcountry.com/american-young-love-is-war/|title='Love Is War' review|last=Dukes|first=Billy|date=15 August 2013|work=Taste of Country|accessdate=4 February 2014}} ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! style="width:10em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| ''American Young''{{cite news|last1=Shelburne|first1=Craig|title=American Young Prepares Debut Album On Curb Records|url=http://www.musicrow.com/2016/07/american-young-prepares-debut-album-on-curb-records/|accessdate=July 2, 2016|work=[[MusicRow]]|date=July 1, 2016}} | * Release date: August 5, 2016 * Label: [[Curb Records]] |- ! scope="row"| ''AYII''{{Cite web|url=https://www.lyricmagazine.co.uk/the-new-album-ayii-from-american-young-uplifting-dreamy-powerful/|title = Review: 'AYII' the New Album from American Young|date = 17 November 2021}} | * Release date: November 19, 2021 * Label: Curb Records |- |} ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:10em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:18em;"| Album details ! colspan="2"| Peak chart
